# type

**Instance Property**

The participant type.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: CKShare.ParticipantType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The property controls the participant type for the share. For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare/ParticipantType].

## Deprecated Properties

- **CKShare.Participant.ParticipantType**: A type that represents the role of the participant.
- **CKShare.ParticipantType**: The role of a participant.
